channel.title: CI/CD Integration on QA Discovery
channel.description: Recent content in CI/CD Integration on QA Discovery

item.title: SuperTest Tutorial: Advanced Usage - Integration CI CD and Github action
item.description: This blog will dive into advanced usage of Supertest, focusing on how to integrate Supertest into a CI/CD process and how to automate tests using GitHub Actions. Readers will learn how to automate the execution of the Supertest test suite through CI/CD tools, ensuring comprehensive interface testing after every code change. We will also discuss in detail how to configure and orchestrate GitHub Actions workflows for continuous integration and automated testing. This blog will help you improve your use of Supertest for more efficient automated testing and a more stable CI/CD process!
